object.label: Label
object.comment: Comment

object.label: Sheet manifestation creation event
object.comment: The preparation of a printing surface: in letterpress, the assembly of ornaments, illustrations and sections of composed type into a forme, ready for printing of sheet-items.

object.label: Imprint element
object.comment: The text of the imprint. Imprints may list printer, publisher, place of publication and sale.

object.label: Entrance in the Stationers' Register event
object.comment: Sparse record of Entrance in the Stationers' Register (not as given on the sheet) of ballads as works. For Entrance of ballads, see Hyder E. Rollins, ‘An Analytical Index to the Ballad-Entries (1557-1709) in the Registers of the Company of Stationers of London’, Studies in Philology, vol. 21, (1924); and R.S. Thomson, ‘The Development of the Broadside Ballad Trade and its Influence upon the Transmission of English Ballads’, (unpublished doctoral thesis, University of Cambridge, 1974)

object.label: Work
object.comment: A distinct intellectual or artistic creation.

object.label: Agent
object.comment: Responsible organization or person

object.label: Tune name element
object.comment: Tune title as given.

object.label: CollectionParticipationEvent
object.comment: Event record of sheet item's participation in a collection

object.label: Performance element
object.comment: Element on sheet describing performance

object.label: Expression
object.comment: FRBR definition of an Expression

object.label: Item
object.comment: FRBR definition of an Item

object.label: Sheet item facsimile
object.comment: The catalogued facsimile of an original ballad sheet, e.g. photographic or xerographic facsimiles.

object.label: Digital image of sheet item
object.comment: A digital image of a ballad sheet or facsimile.

object.label: Illustration element
object.comment: A region of a Sheet Manifestation that corresponds to the printing-surface (block or plate) containing pictorial content, expressible through coordinates; the numerical order in which the illustration appears on the sheet; and a cataloguer-defined ID which may be referenced to surviving woodblocks or other printing surfaces, and to other impressions that are conjectured to derive from the same block. IllustrationElements originating from a common block may be conjectured by cataloguers from close analysis of impressions for damage, matching dimensions or other features that are sufficiently consistent across impressions, allowing for damage to block or sheet or variations in inking. IllustrationElements may be grouped through sameAs relationships in the absence of a unique ID.

object.label: Illustration work
object.comment: The composition, or distinct version, of a visual subject or theme. Subjects and themes may be provided using a controlled vocabulary (e.g. ICONCLASS) or free-text narrative description, in order to link different realizations of the same subject.

object.label: Measurement
object.comment: Dimensions of an area of a Sheet Item or SheetItemImage

object.label: Ballad text manifestation
object.comment: The ballad as a lyric, made up of an aggregation of text-elements and associated elements (e.g. AuthorElement).

object.label: Event describing the creation of a collection
object.comment: Record of the creation of a collection.

object.label: Address
object.comment: Address of agent or event or collection

object.label: Sheet item aggregation
object.comment: volume containing more than one sheet item

object.label: Title element
object.comment: Title as given

object.label: Prose Element
object.comment: Prose on a sheet manifestation that is not part of a BalladTextManifestation

object.label: Collection
object.comment: Describes the custodial history and status of original ballad holdings, including both Items and aggregations of Items (e.g. albums).

object.label: Sheet manifestation
object.comment: Manifestation of a ballad sheet, corresponding to the printer's forme, stereotype plate or other printing-surface from which invariant copies (SheetItems) were produced.

object.label: Series number element
object.comment: Publisher's series name and/or number as printed.

object.label: Printing event for a ballad sheet
object.comment: The creation event for a SheetItem. This is to be distinguished from Sheet Manifestation creation event, which is the assembly of printing materials preparatory to a Printing Event. Where stereotype plates or standing type was employed, there may be some distance in time that separates the two events.

object.label: License statement element
object.comment: License as given

object.label: Dispersal event for a collection
object.comment: Record of the dispersal of a ballad collection

object.label: Author name element
object.comment: Name of author as given, not as attributed.

object.label: Tune work
object.comment: The tune as a distinct artistic creation or version, independent from the name(s) under which it may go by and the ballad lyrics with which it may be associated.

object.label: Date element
object.comment: element containing date manifestation

object.label: Ballad as song lyric
object.comment: The ballad as a distinct artistic creation realized as a song lyric.

object.label: Text body element
object.comment: The body of the ballad lyric, as given

object.label: Ornament element
object.comment: A printer's ornament.

object.label: Musical score element
object.comment: The score of a tune as given: it may be provided as a MIDI or other representation

object.label: Performance event
object.comment: A record of a performance event, independent from performances recorded on the sheet.

object.label: Sheet item
object.comment: A single printed item derived from a sheet manifestation: the ballad in hand.

object.label: Has format
object.comment: Format of the sheet e.g. single sheet, half sheet

object.label: Alternative Title
object.comment: Alternative title

object.label: Standardized title
object.comment: Cataloguer assigned standardized title for work

object.label: Normalized alternative title
object.comment: normalised (corrected) alternative title

object.label: Typeface
object.comment: typeface of the subject: this may refer to a type style (e.g. blackletter, Roman) or may contain an attribution a specific font or face.

object.label: First line of verse
object.comment: First line of the verse

object.label: Record URL
object.comment: link to a separate catalogue record

object.label: Prose
object.comment: A preamble to the text, not forming part of the lyric

object.label: Subject
object.comment: The subject of the ballad

object.label: Title
object.comment: Title of sheet manifestation as given, if distinct from ballad text manifestation(s).

object.label: Illustration text
object.comment: Text contained within the illustration (speech bubbles etc.)

object.label: Local identifier
object.comment: An unambiguous identifier for the resource

object.label: Ornamentation style
object.comment: Style of ornamentation

object.label: Verse
object.comment: A verse of the lyric

object.label: Name of tune
object.comment: Catalogued name of tune

object.label: Cataloguing notes
object.comment: Cataloguer's observations

object.label: Condition
object.comment: physical state of the sheet

object.label: URL to sheet item image
object.comment: The URL of an image of a sheet item

object.label: Has manuscript additions
object.comment: Description of and transcription of any manuscript additions on the sheet item e.g. location, identification if possible and the content

object.label: Standard identifier
object.comment: standard identifier from secondary works or databases, dependent on subject

object.label: Name of author
object.comment: Normalized name of author

object.label: Normalized referred title
object.comment: Normalized (corrected) referred title

object.label: Normalized title
object.comment: Normalized (corrected) title

object.label: Referred title
object.comment: A title of another ballad that is referred to from the title of the ballad, such as "An answer to [Referred title]"

object.label: Imprint
object.comment: Imprint as given

object.label: Locality
object.comment: Example would be city name

object.label: Creation date text
object.comment: creation date as it appears in the cataloguing notes

object.label: Ordinal number of the ballad
object.comment: Should not be confused with the series number

object.label: Series name
object.comment: A publisher's series, such as "Songs for the million"

object.label: Last line of the refrain
object.comment: Last line of the refrain

object.label: Series number
object.comment: Any number printed on the sheet seeming to be number applied by the publisher, sometimes with the series name, but also recorded if no series name is present

object.label: Occurred during year
object.comment: Occurred during a specified year

object.label: Sheet manifestation title
object.comment: Title of sheet, if given (as distinct from title of Ballad)

object.label: Musical score text
object.comment: Text contained in the musical score

object.label: Name of agent
object.comment: Name of responsbile agent

object.label: Occurred during or after year
object.comment: Occurred during or after a specified year

object.label: Name of collection
object.comment: Name of collection

object.label: Shelfmark
object.comment: A local identifier for sheet item

object.label: First line of refrain
object.comment: First line of address

object.label: Performance title
object.comment: Title of a performance

object.label: Printing process
object.comment: Printing process e.g. letterpress, lithography, intaglio, mixed

object.label: Street address
object.comment: Historical address, which may also contain modernized address and geolocation.

object.label: Date
object.comment: Date (Old and/or New Style)

object.label: Type of annotation
object.comment: type of annotation e.g. marginalia, cataloguer's notes

object.label: Number of ballads on sheet
object.comment: Recording the number of ballads that exist on the sheet manifestation

object.label: Theme
object.comment: Theme contained within the Ballad

object.label: Occurred during or before year
object.comment: Occurred during or before a specified year

object.label: Musical score
object.comment: Musical score

object.label: License statement
object.comment: License statement as printed on sheet item

object.label: Entrance text
object.comment: Text of entrance of a work in the Stationers' Register

object.label: Support
object.comment: Note of the material support, e.g. vellum, paper.

object.label: Has annotation
object.comment: Annotation that is the product of research concerning any part of the data.

object.label: Has creator
object.comment: Agent with role of creator
sheet manifestation participant in event

object.label: Enterer
object.comment: Name of agent responsible for making an entrance in the Stationers' Register

object.label: Was derived from
object.comment: Description of a sheet manifestation creation event was derived from a specified imprint element

object.label: Has participant
object.comment: Agent involved in event

object.label: Sheet item participant in event
object.comment: Sheet item participant in collection event

object.label: Work entered in Stationer's Register
object.comment: Sparse record of Entrance in the Stationers' Register (not as given on the sheet) for ballad works. For Entrance of ballads, see Hyder E. Rollins, ‘An Analytical Index to the Ballad-Entries (1557-1709) in the Registers of the Company of Stationers of London’, Studies in Philology, vol. 21, (1924); and R.S. Thomson, ‘The Development of the Broadside Ballad Trade and its Influence upon the Transmission of English Ballads’, (unpublished doctoral thesis, University of Cambridge, 1974)

object.label: Musical score
object.comment: musical score of the ballad

object.label: Part of collection
object.comment: links sheet item to a collection

object.label: Has sheet item
object.comment: collection has specified sheet item

object.label: Licenser
object.comment: A manifestation exemplified in an item

object.label: Is derivative of
object.comment: Manifestation is derivative of another manifestation of the same class

object.label: Forms part of
object.comment: relating sheet item to collection or sheet item aggregation

object.label: Follows
object.comment: one manifestation follows another manifestation of the same class

object.label: Has image
object.comment: has facsimile of sheet item

object.label: Illustration printed
object.comment: printing of a illustration manifestation

object.label: Has address
object.comment: street address

object.label: Precedes
object.comment: Manifestation precedes another manifestation of same class

object.label: Is different from
object.comment: is different from another illustration manifestation

object.label: Collection
object.comment: collection that a sheet item is added to

object.label: Sheet manifestation composed of
object.comment: Manifestation that is part of a ballad sheet manifestation

object.label: Performer
object.comment: Person / organization record for the performer of a sheet manifestation
is composed of

object.label: Has printer
object.comment: Printer of the sheet manifestation

object.label: Related to
object.comment: manifestation related to another manifestation of the same class

object.label: Has location
object.comment: Location of event, or agent e.g. Organization, Person

object.label: Same edition as
object.comment: Same edition as manifestation of the same class

object.label: Exemplar of
object.comment: Examplar of

object.label: Sheet item created
object.comment: Creation of a sheet item by printing

object.label: Forms part of ballad text
object.comment: Forms part of ballad text manifestation

object.label: Has author
object.comment: author of ballad text manifestation

object.label: Owner
object.comment: owner of a collection

object.label: Referred to by
object.comment: organisation or person who refers to a sheet manifestation

object.label: Performance
object.comment: performance of a sheet manifestation

object.label: Is facsimile of
object.comment: Is facsimile of specified sheet item

object.label: Incorporates illustration
object.comment: an illustration manifestation incorporates another illustration manifestation

object.label: Has measurement
object.comment: describes measurement relating to element e.g. dimension

object.label: Has artist
object.comment: comment by cataloguer on the illustration identifying the artist, the person responsible for the illustration work

object.label: Same as
object.comment: Manifestation same as manifestation of same class
